author: Okogba
title: Visa problem holds back Akpeyi
text:
Home » Sports » Visa problem holds back Akpeyi Visa problem holds back Akpeyi On 4:15 am In Sports by Okogba Comments 
C hippa United goalkeeper, Daniel Akpeyi left the British High Commission in South Africa empty-handed yesterday morning, without picking up a visa that will enable him join the Super Eagles in London. Daniel Akpeyi 
But all hope is not lost as the officials at the embassy claimed that the travelling document is read but he can only pick it up the next working day. 
Today is a very important public holiday in South Africa, the Human Rights Day, which commemorates the establishment of the South African Human Rights Commission (SAHRC), and it is thought that the British High Commission will observe the holiday of their host country. 
If that is the case, the earliest date Akpeyi will see the endorsement on his Nigerian passport is March 22, a day before the Nigeria squad faces Senegal in their first game of 2017. 
Of the three invited goalkeepers, only Wolverhampton Wanderers star Carl Ikeme was in camp as at the time of this report.
